    • Constructor Detail

      • LzopOutputStream

        public LzopOutputStream(java.io.OutputStream out,
                LzoCompressor compressor,
                @CheckForSigned
                int inputBufferSize,
                long flags)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Constructs a new LzopOutputStream.

        I recommend limiting flags to the following unless you REALLY know what you are doing:

        • LzopConstants.F_ADLER32_C
        • LzopConstants.F_ADLER32_D
        • LzopConstants.F_CRC32_C
        • LzopConstants.F_CRC32_D
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
